reviewText: I love it. I have always been a fan of Americas castles.
It's terrific to be able to see how the other half lived, and to get to places on a leisurely armchair tour that I wouldn't see otherwise.

I adore this series. It is probably the best in "showing off" that we do have true American Castles. The architecture and interior design are spectacular in every  angle. I saw this series  when it was on prime time. I have just about every episode of this series on dvd. You won't be disappointed. All history bufs and design buffs.
As stated before, "America's Castles" series is one of the best ever and I enjoy watching them over and over.
